column1: Smoque BBQ////I ordered takeout from Smoque as I had a craving for brisket
column2: and this place is the spot to get it (have already been here numerous times
column3: never disappoints). I got a brisket sandwich and a pulled pork sandwich for my wife
column4: as she vastly prefers that to the brisket. When we got home
column5: we found that we had received two brisket sandwiches instead of one being a pulled pork. Not a big deal
column6: and called back to explain the situation to see what could be done to correct it.
